charges.description: FAILED TO RESIDE WITHIN THE CITY OF NEW YORK OR COUNTIES OF WESTCHESTER, ROCKLAND, ORANGE, PUTNAM, NASSAU OR SUFFOLK AS REQUIRED.
FAILED TO SUBMIT CHANGE OF NAME, RESIDENCE OR SOCIAL CONDITION FORM TO DEPARTMENT.
HAVING CHANGED SAID MEMBER'S RESIDENCE, FAILED TO MAINTAIN CORRECT DEPARTMENT OF MOTOR VEHICLE RECORDS .
WHILE ON SICK REPORT WRONGFULLY LEFT CONFINES OF THE CITY OR RESIDENCE COUNTIES WITHOUT APPROVAL FROM CHIEF OF PERSONNEL.
WRONGFULLY REPORTED A NEW YORK ADDRESS TO THE DEPARTMENT WHEN IN FACT SAID MEMBER RESIDED IN NEW JERSEY.

charges.description: WHILE OFF-DUTY, FAILED TO REMAIN AT THE SCENE OF AN UNUSUAL POLICE OCCURRENCE AND/OR PROMPTLY NOTIFY THE OPERATIONS UNIT.
WHILE OFF-DUTY, WRONGFULLY PROVIDED INACCURATE OR INCOMPLETE INFORMATION TO A NASSAU COUNTY 911 DISPATCHER.
WHILE OFF-DUTY,  UPON BEING PROMPTED FOR HER NAME BY A NASSAU COUNTY 911 DISPATCHER, FAILED TO PROVIDE HER NAME.
WHILE OFF-DUTY, WRONGFULLY REMOVED A PARTICIPANT IN AN UNUSUAL POLICE OCCURRENCE FROM THE SCENE OF THE INCIDENT WITHOUT INFORMING OR SEEKING GUIDANCE FROM LOCAL LAW ENFORCEMENT OR THE DEPARTMENT.

charges.description: SAID OFFICER SCHEDULED TO PERFORM A TOUR OF 1400 HOURS TO 2235 HOURS, WAS ABSENT FROM SAID ASSIGNMENT AT 1400 HOURS AND DID NOT REPORT UNTIL 1425 HOURS, A PERIOD OF TWENTY-FIVE (25) MINUTES ABSENT WITHOUT LEAVE.
charges.penalty: DISMISSAL PROBATION (12 month(s) ), PRE-TRIAL SUSPENSION DAYS (30 day(s) ), VACATION DAYS (15 day(s) )

charges.description: DID KNOWINGLY ASSOCIATE WITH A PERSON REASONABLY BELIEVED TO BE ENGAGED IN, LIKELY TO ENGAGE IN, OR TO HAVE ENGAGED IN CRIMINAL ACTIVITIES.
charges.penalty: DISMISSAL PROBATION (12 month(s) ), PRE-TRIAL SUSPENSION DAYS (30 day(s) ), VACATION DAYS (15 day(s) )

charges.description: DID WRONGFULLY AND WITHOUT JUST CAUSE HAVE AN INTEREST IN OR AN ASSOCIATION WITH PREMISES ENGAGED IN ILLEGAL GAMBLING OPERATIONS.
charges.penalty: DISMISSAL PROBATION (12 month(s) ), PRE-TRIAL SUSPENSION DAYS (30 day(s) ), VACATION DAYS (15 day(s) )

charges.description: FAILED TO DISCLOSE POTENTIALLY RELEVANT INFORMATION, SPECIFICALLY THAT HE KNEW A PERSON KNOWN TO THE DEPARTMENT RUNNING AN ILLEGAL GAMBLING OPERATION.
charges.penalty: DISMISSAL PROBATION (12 month(s) ), PRE-TRIAL SUSPENSION DAYS (30 day(s) ), VACATION DAYS (15 day(s) )

allegations.description: 02.Wrongfully frisked an individual known to the Department.

charges.description: WHILE OFF-DUTY, POLICE OFFICER DID WRONGFULLY MAKE COMMUNICATIONS TO A PERSON KNOWN TO THE DEPARTMENT, IN A MANNER LIKELY TO CAUSE ANNOYANCE OR ALARM.
WHILE OFF-DUTY, DID WRONGFULLY ATTEMPT TO PREVENT A PERSON KNOWN TO THE DEPARTMENT FROM FILING A COMPLAINT AGAINST HER WITH THE NYPD.
WHILE ON-DUTY, SAID OFFICER WAS GIVEN A DIRECTIVE BY A SERGEANT, TO TAKE DOWN INFORMATION FROM A CALLER MAKING A CIVILIAN COMPLAINT, AND SAID OFFICER FAILED TO COMPLY WITH SAID DIRECTIVE.
WHILE ON-DUTY, WAS DISCOURTEOUS TO A SERGEANT.

charges.description: WHILE OFF-DUTY, WRONGFULLY OPERATED A MOTOR VEHICLE WHILE UNDER THE INFLUENCE OF AN INTOXICANT.
charges.penalty: COUNSELING, DISMISSAL PROBATION (12 month(s) ), ORDERED BREATH TESTING, PRE-TRIAL SUSPENSION DAYS (31 day(s) ), SUSPENDED W/O PAY (15 day(s) ), VACATION DAYS (15 day(s) )

charges.description: WHILE OFF-DUTY, WRONGFULLY OPERATED A MOTOR VEHICLE WHILE HIS ABILITY WAS IMPAIRED BY THE CONSUMPTION OF ALCOHOL.
charges.penalty: COUNSELING, DISMISSAL PROBATION (12 month(s) ), ORDERED BREATH TESTING, PRE-TRIAL SUSPENSION DAYS (31 day(s) ), SUSPENDED W/O PAY (15 day(s) ), VACATION DAYS (15 day(s) )

charges.description: WHILE OFF-DUTY, WRONGFULLY REFUSED TO SUBMIT TO A BREATHALYZER TEST.
charges.penalty: COUNSELING, DISMISSAL PROBATION (12 month(s) ), ORDERED BREATH TESTING, PRE-TRIAL SUSPENSION DAYS (31 day(s) ), SUSPENDED W/O PAY (15 day(s) ), VACATION DAYS (15 day(s) )

charges.description: WHILE OFF-DUTY, WRONGFULLY CONSUMED AN INTOXICANT TO THE EXTENT THAT HE WAS UNFIT FOR DUTY.
